arrg, last line should be Sharay, to rhyme with today.. stupid spell check

-----Original Message-----
From: Joshua R. Moore [mailto:josh@...]
Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 1:42 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Simple Shin Shindig


From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>

Shin shiminy shin shiminy, shin shin Sharew
those undead knight froggies got bard armor for you
shin shiminy shin shiminy shin shin sharee
quickly go loot them as fast and fleet as can be
shin shiminy shin shiminy shin shin sharee

-Martyn, in a slightly strange mood today
